Welcome to Facttonic!

Your one-stop destination for all things movies, animation and web series. Our channel is dedicated to providing you with the most interesting and lesser-known facts and trivia about your favorite films and series. 
From behind-the-scenes information to Easter eggs and hidden references, we've got it all covered. 
Whether you're a die-hard fan or just a casual viewer, there's something for everyone here.

So, make sure to subscribe and hit the notification bell to never miss a video from Facttonic!
